text: Hagi ana knafina, ra mono nompima muse zagame'ma nehaza zana atre'za zamasunku zagame hu'za zavi krafa hugahaze. Na'ankure fri vahe zamavufagamo'za mika kaziga umase emase hugahaze. Hagi ana vahera kumamofo fegu'a eri'za ometre ometre hugahaze, hu'na Nagra maka'zama kegava hu'noa Ra Anumzamo'na nehue.
